sourcesContent:

styleUrls: ['./flag-icon.component.scss'], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, }) export class FlagIconComponent implements OnInit { public detail: boolean = false; public flag: string; public val: toggleWithInfo(icon: string) { this.detail = true; this.flag = icon; this.val = ''; } //Copy an icon code copyText(val: string) { let selBox = document.createElement('textarea'); selBox.style.position = 'fixed'; selBox.style.left = '0'; selBox.style.top = '0'; selBox.style.opacity = '0'; selBox.value = ''; document.body.appendChild(selBox); selBox.focus(); selBox.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(selBox); this.toastrService.show('

Code Copied to clipboard

', '', { closeButton: true, enableHtml: true, positionClass: 'toast-bottom-right' }); } ngOnInit() { } }
